channel.title: Shops, Npcs, and autospawn, etc... Help
channel.description:
hello, i am making my own server, im using ownage pk and im using moparscape client. i have some experience in java coding, and common sence lol. Id like to add shops, but then i have to edit the autospawn.cfg, client.java, and shops.cfg. i think i got the idea, the npc shows up, but the shop doesn't work.
so anyone that can help me, my email is sax_ozqp@yahoo.com, just post here first, then we can get in touch via IM
Thanks, Sax

item.title: Shops, Npcs, and autospawn, etc... Help
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Here is what you really have to do, it will help alot…

go into you client.java an search for “Aubury Rune shop” after the “}” paste in this shop code:

} else if (NPCID == IDgoeshere) { //NAME OF SHOP PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ?; //NAME OF SHOP

After wanneshop = ?, cahnge the ? to whatever the shop ID is.

Read full topic
item.source: Shops, Npcs, and autospawn, etc... Help

and you’ve to do it good in client.java or it won’t work
